attributes.action: Disolve Government and hold a general election as Gordon Brown will have no Mandate to run Brtiain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair said he would see out a full last term, he isn't. Gordon Brown has breezed to the post of Prime Minister without the say of the people of Britain.  There must be a general election held to restore a bit of pride in our politics.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
